name: discordant
description: A modern XMPP-based chat client with video/audio streaming support. Built with Fresh (Deno) and Preact.

comments.purpose: 100% Deno project - no npm dependencies needed for development or production!
comments.development: Run 'deno task start' for dev server, 'deno task test' for tests
comments.building: Run 'deno task build' to build for production
comments.future: Tauri will be added later for desktop apps
